get.summary: Simulates the executions of rules filtered by tag 'Schedule' within the given times.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time of the simulated rule executions. Will default to the current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: End time of the simulated rule executions. Will default to 30 days after the start time. Must be less than 180 days after the given start time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

400.description: The max. simulation duration of 180 days is exceeded.

requestBody.description: action inputs as map (parameter name as key / argument as value)

500.description: Creation of action handler or execution failed

200.description: Channel type with provided channelTypeUID does not exist.

get.summary: Gets all available config descriptions.
Gets a config description by URI.
Gets all bindings that support discovery.
Gets information about the discovery services for a binding.

post.summary: Starts asynchronous discovery process for a binding and returns the timeout in seconds of the discovery operation.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: input parameter to start the discovery

post.summary: Approves the discovery result by adding the thing to the registry.

409.description: No binding found that supports this thing.

delete.summary: Removes the discovery result from the inbox.

404.description: Discovery result not found in the inbox.

get.summary: Get all discovered things.

parameters.name: includeIgnored
parameters.description: If true, include ignored inbox entries. Defaults to true

post.summary: Flags a discovery result as ignored for further processing.
Removes ignore flag from a discovery result.
Create file format.

parameters.name: hideDefaultParameters
parameters.description: hide the configuration parameters having the default value

parameters.name: hideDefaultChannels
parameters.description: hide the non extensible channels having a default configuration

parameters.name: hideChannelLinksAndMetadata
parameters.description: hide the channel links and metadata for items

schema.example:
version: 1
things:
  binding:typeBridge:idBridge:
    isBridge: true
    label: Label bridge
    location: Location bridge
    config:
      stringParam: my value
  binding:type:idBridge:id:
    bridge: binding:typeBridge:idBridge
    label: Label thing
    location: Location thing
    config:
      booleanParam: true
      decimalParam: 2.5
items:
  Group1:
    type: Group
    label: Label
  Group2:
    type: Group
    group:
      type: Switch
      function: Or
      parameters:
        - "ON"
        - "OFF"
    label: Label
  MyItem:
    type: Switch
    label: Label
    icon: icon
    groups:
      - Group1
      - Group2
    tags:
      - Tag1
      - Tag2
    channel: binding:type:idBridge:id:channelid
    metadata:
      namespace:
        value: my value
        config:
          param: my param value

post.summary: Create file format for a list of items in registry.

parameters.name: hideDefaultParameters
parameters.description: hide the configuration parameters having the default value

requestBody.description: Array of item names. If empty or omitted, return all Items.

schema.example:
version: 1
items:
  Group1:
    type: Group
    label: Label
  Group2:
    type: Group
    group:
      type: Switch
      function: Or
      parameters:
        - "ON"
        - "OFF"
    label: Label
  MyItem:
    type: Switch
    label: Label
    icon: icon
    groups:
      - Group1
      - Group2
    tags:
      - Tag1
      - Tag2
    channel: binding:type:id:channelid
    metadata:
      namespace:
        value: my value
        config:
          param: my param value

404.description: One or more items not found in registry.

post.summary: Create file format for a list of things in things or discovery registry.

parameters.name: hideDefaultParameters
parameters.description: hide the configuration parameters having the default value

requestBody.description: Array of Thing UIDs. If empty or omitted, return all Things from the Registry.

schema.example:
version: 1
things:
  binding:typeBridge:idBridge:
    isBridge: true
    label: Label bridge
    location: Location bridge
    config:
      stringParam: my value
  binding:type:idBridge:id:
    bridge: binding:typeBridge:idBridge
    label: Label thing
    location: Location thing
    config:
      booleanParam: true
      decimalParam: 2.5

404.description: One or more things not found in registry.

post.summary: Parse file format.

schema.example:
version: 1
things:
  binding:typeBridge:idBridge:
    isBridge: true
    label: Label bridge
    location: Location bridge
    config:
      stringParam: my value
  binding:type:idBridge:id:
    bridge: binding:typeBridge:idBridge
    label: Label thing
    location: Location thing
    config:
      booleanParam: true
      decimalParam: 2.5
items:
  Group1:
    type: Group
    label: Label
  Group2:
    type: Group
    group:
      type: Switch
      function: Or
      parameters:
        - "ON"
        - "OFF"
    label: Label
  MyItem:
    type: Switch
    label: Label
    icon: icon
    groups:
      - Group1
      - Group2
    tags:
      - Tag1
      - Tag2
    channel: binding:type:idBridge:id:channelid
    metadata:
      namespace:
        value: my value
        config:
          param: my param value

delete.summary: Removes an item from the registry.

get.summary: Get all available items.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: metadata selector - a comma separated list or a regular expression (returns all if no value given)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: limit output to the given fields (comma separated)

parameters.name: staticDataOnly
parameters.description: provides a cacheable list of values not expected to change regularly and checks the If-Modified-Since header, all other parameters are ignored except "metadata"

put.summary: Adds a list of items to the registry or updates the existing items.

put.summary: Updates the state of an item.

parameters.name: X-OpenHAB-Source

requestBody.description: Valid item state (e.g., ON, OFF) either as plain text or JSON

404.description: Content does not match the path

get.summary: Gets a persistence service configuration.

put.summary: Sets a persistence service configuration.

get.summary: Gets item persistence data from the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start time of the data to return. Will default to 1 day before endtime. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End time of the data to return. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of data to return. This parameter will enable paging.

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: Gets one value before and after the requested period.

parameters.name: itemState
parameters.description: Adds the current Item state into the requested period (the item state will be before or at the endtime)

put.summary: Stores item persistence data into the persistence service.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Id of the persistence service. If not provided the default service will be used

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time of the data to be stored. Will default to current time. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

400.description: Item not found, invalid state, invalid time format, or persistence service not found or not modifiable.

delete.summary: Deletes item persistence data from a specific persistence service in a given time range.

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: Start of the time range to be deleted. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: End of the time range to be deleted. [yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ]

get.summary: Gets configuration problems with persistence services.
